Product Title: Meerkat Manor: Season 3
Review Date: 2014/11/29
Store: Animal Planet  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Discovery Channel, Channels, Animal Planet
Product Description: ['Now in the third season, this ground-breaking series continues to document the lives of a group of meerkats, known as "The Whiskers." Led by the dominant female/matriarch Flower, the Whiskers face new rivals, the Zappa tribe, another meerkat mob best characterized as the neighbors from hell. No stranger to a good challenge, the Whiskers are ready to stand their ground.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Animal Planet', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Runtime': '4 hours and 46 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '5.42 x 0.57 x 7.45 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Director': 'Animal Planet', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '4 hours and 46 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 26, 2010', 'Actors': 'Animal Planet', 'Studio': 'Discovery - Gaiam', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: I love the Meerkats, and think that these were a heartfelt series. Nice writing and photography! I just wish there were many more years of filming.
Review Title: I love the Meerkats
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Covert Affairs
Review Date: 2014/12/04
Categories: Suspense, Drama, Action
Product Description: ['The hit international spy drama returns this summer for its highly anticipated fourth season with Golden Globe-nominee Piper Perabo as Annie Walker. This season kicks off after Annie and her longtime best friend and blind CIA tech-op, Auggie (Christopher Gorham) finally acknowledging their romantic feelings for one another.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Stephen Kay', 'Félix Enríquez Alcalá', 'Allan Kroeker', 'Jamie Barber', 'Emile B. Levisetti', 'Kate Woods', 'J. Miller Tobin', 'Christopher Gorham', 'Larysa Kondracki', 'Ken Girotti'], 'Starring': ['Piper Perabo', 'Christopher Gorham', 'Gregory Itzin']}
Review Text: I can hardly wait for a new episode to become available on Amazon Prime.  I do wish that Piper would wear her hair up as she did in the beginning, as it was so graceful and elegant, but she is probably representing a harder working-in the trenches-type of woman now. Great series!
Review Title: Great series!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Numb3rs
Review Date: 2015/04/13
Categories: Suspense, Drama
Product Description: ['FBI agent Don Eppes recruits his mathematical genius brother Charlie to help the Bureau solve a wide range of challenging crimes in Los Angeles.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dennis Smith', 'Alex Zakrzewski', 'John Behring', 'J. Miller Tobin', 'Stephen Gyllenhaal', 'Ralph Hemecker', 'Julie Hébert', 'Ken Sanzel', 'Rob Morrow', 'Rod Holcomb'], 'Starring': ['Rob Morrow', 'David Krumholtz', 'Judd Hirsch']}
Review Text: I love this program, the interplay among the main characters, the strong female lead, and the underlying theme of using predictive mathematical strategies to narrow down the possible suspects in an investigation. While my mathematical knowledge is nowhere near the level used in this show, I do have some background in statistics, and the types of analysis with which I am familiar with are used appropriately within the context of this show. From now on I will have a renewed appreciation for ANOVA (analysis of variance) and multiple regression equations, thanks to this show. Kudus to the writers for integrating mathematical analysis into a crime drama, and for bringing this show to life.  The actors are also great in bringing these episodes to life, and from taking an otherwise potentially boring approach to criminal analysis to life in an exciting way!  I am enjoying a Numb3rs marathon viewing of my own, and while enjoying the episode I am viewing, I always look forward to the next episode. I am never disappointed.
Review Title: In the context of murder mysteries, statistical analyses comes to life!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2015/04/30
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ken Sanzel', 'Rod Holcomb', 'Alex Zakrzewski', 'Dennis Smith', 'Ralph Hemecker', 'Stephen Gyllenhaal', 'Julie Hébert', 'Gwyneth Horder-Payton', 'Rob Morrow:Nicolas Falacci'], 'Producers': ['Ridley Scott', 'Tony Scott', 'Ken Sanzel', 'David W. Zucker', 'Nick Falacci', 'Cheryl Heuton', 'Don McGill'], 'Starring': ['Rob Morrow', 'David Krumholtz', 'Judd Hirsch'], 'Studio': ['CBS']}
Review Text: I enjoyed the interplay between mathematics and tracking down criminals. The academic setting was also quite appreciated; was it provided a context that was much more refined and interesting than a comparable program without higher level thinking skills functioning as a foundation for interplay among the major characters,
Review Title: Never enough Numb3rs--more episodes please!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2015/06/01
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Armando Iannucci', 'Tristram Shapeero', 'Christopher Morris'], 'Starring': ['Julia Louis-Dreyfus', 'Anna Chlumsky', 'Tony Hale'], 'Studio': ['HBO']}
Review Text: This is a hysterically funny comedy, and gives a very interesting view of politics and how one's intentions may never be fulfilled. Great comedic drama.
Review Title: I don't want to be VEEP after watching this--do you?
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2015/07/10
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Scott Foley'], 'Producers': ['James Carpinello', 'Scott Foley', 'Joe Hardesty', 'Patrick Wilson'], 'Starring': ['Patrick Wilson', 'Scott Foley', 'Donald Faison'], 'Studio': ['Tribeca Films']}
Review Text: Predictable but funny as heck. It is so easy to empathize with the men in this movie, and their animosity towards Ward's wife. It is difficult to conceive of anyone who would want to be close to Ward's wife, or who would agree with her values and actions. It is a great light summer movie, where you don't have to look too far to understand the characters. Depth there is not, but it is a light-hearted movie.
Review Title: I wouldn't want to have to live with Ward's wife--not in this lifetime...or ever
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2015/07/16
Average Rating: 2.2
Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Ana Grillo', 'Beth Nelsen'], 'Producers': ['Ana Blue Grillo', 'Beth Nelsen'], 'Starring': ['---'], 'Studio': ['Indie Crush']}
Review Text: For a teen audience. Not my taste at all.
Review Title: Somebody else must like this movie. For a teen audience.
Rating: 1.0

Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Scott Foley'], 'Producers': ['James Carpinello', 'Scott Foley', 'Joe Hardesty', 'Patrick Wilson'], 'Starring': ['Patrick Wilson', 'Scott Foley', 'Donald Faison'], 'Studio': ['Tribeca Films']}
Review Text: Predictable but funny as heck. It is so easy to empathize with the men in this movie, and their animosity towards Ward's wife. It is difficult to conceive of anyone who would want to be close to Ward's wife, or who would agree with her values and actions. It is a great light summer movie, where you don't have to look too far to understand the characters. Depth there is not, but it is a light-hearted movie.
Review Title: I wouldn't want to have to live with Ward's wife--not in this lifetime...or ever

SUMMARY:
The individual displays a strong preference for high-quality, character-driven narratives, consistently awarding ratings between 4.4 and 5.0 for most purchases. This person shows an affinity for natural documentaries, particularly involving meerkats, indicating a preference for animal-related content, often emphasizing emotional engagement and storytelling depth.

Across different genres, they favor series that showcase intricate character development, with notable enthusiasm for ensemble casts and strong performances, particularly in drama and suspense. The recurrent themes include a preference for intelligent narratives that incorporate analytical thinking, such as the integration of mathematics in crime-solving contexts.

Price sensitivity appears low, with a willingness to invest in a variety of media formats, including DVDs, regardless of potential content advisories like violence or foul language, often valuing the overall experience over explicit content warnings.

Interestingly, there's a discernible drop in ratings for comedies, with lower scores assigned to films perceived as predictable or lacking depth. This suggests a distinct preference for substance over superficial entertainment. Overall, the core preferences center on engaging, well-crafted stories with substantial character arcs, primarily in drama and documentary formats while maintaining a critical stance on comedic content lacking in nuance.

target_interaction.title: Wish I were able to view all of the episodes.
target_interaction.text: I would have given this 5 stars, no question, but I have had a difficult time getting it to load so I can see the rest of the episodes. I think the premise of the series is quite interesting, and raises some difficult questions for the family. The characters of the "synths" are quite interesting, in an AI (Artificial Intelligence) kind of way. I am looking forward to how some of the human/synth problems are resolved. A very unique and fun series to watch. I highly recommend it. I was completely taken by surprise about how much I have enjoyed this series.
